text.0:
My name is Ashley and I’m a 3rd year PhD student at Ohio State University. My work focuses on epigenetic regulation of heart failure and cardiac aging. I’m passionate about mentoring URMs, science communication and community outreach. :smiling_face_selector::Haiti:
@BlackInCardio #BLACKINCARDIORollCall https://t.co/hPKnE4qbit

Heyy y'all! I'm Chi-Chi & I'm a #PhD candidate in #Pharmacology @UMich. I use #cardiac #ephys to investigate the use of antibody fragments that target the cardiac #ionchannel (hERG) to treat diseases of cardiac excitability.

#BlackinCardioRollCall
#BlackInCardio

text.2: Hi #BlackInCardioRollCall ! Dr. Stephanie Lindsey here, postdoc at Stanford University and incoming Assistant professor at UCSD. I study cardiovascular development and pediatric cardiology. I began research as an undergrad and it has taken me around the globe. @BlackInCardio https://t.co/v1SvfirK35
text.3: #BlackInCardioRollCall                      Hi! I’m a 2nd year Genetics PhD student at Yale. (@XULA1925 :yellow_heart: c/o ‘19) My work involves studying how mechanical stimuli experienced by blood vessels impacts gene expression https://t.co/psFswZnvlR
